name.text: IG Research Directory Submission Form Template

value.text:
Thank you very much for your submission to IG Research Directory


Kind regards,

T

description.text: This metadata set defines the email template to be sent to the applicant.

value.text: A user has submit to th eIG Research Directoty.

description.text: This metadata set defines the email template to be sent to the portal admin.

content.text:
Protection of Privacy - Personal information provided is collected in accordance with Section 33(c) of the Alberta Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act (the FOIP Act) and will be protected under Part 2 of that Act. It will be used for the purpose of the Intersections of Gender Researcher Directory. Information collected will be used to administer and manage the Gender Researcher Directory. Information will be used to highlight and mobilize intersectional research, for statistical reporting, and to identify and support equity seeking groups. Any public disclosures of information from the directory will be in aggregate form only.

Should you require further information about collection, use and disclosure of personal information, please contact intersectionsofgender@ualberta.ca.
Fields identified by * are mandatory

This information will be used to identify equity-seeking groups in order for IG to highlight, support, and mobilize their intersectional research. This information will remain private unless display this on my public profile is checked for each identity category. Your completed profile is important as it helps all researchers see themselves in the fabric of the University of Alberta community. We realize self-identification is a complex matter and that multiple categories may be selected and/or that a more thorough self-identification may be provided in the Another'' field - we welcome feedback on this process.

name.text: Identify keywords that are related to your research area
Please add keywords that are specific to your research area not already identified above.

content.text: Section 4: Research Area and Community Involvement

name.text: Provide your research question or description in under 50 words. Please indicate how your work relates to IG.
What, if any, community-based projects are you involved in? This could include activist work, community-based research and engagement, and/or volunteerism related to your research.
Please provide links to your work. We hope directory users can learn more about your research and community work.

description.text:
Examples: Websites/blogs, social media pages/accounts (FB, IG, Twitter, tumblr, etc.)
Publications/reports or other digital content relevant to your work (google scholar, Academia.edu). Digital media (radio, podcast)

name.text: Display this on my public profile?
Are you currently collaborating with researchers at the U of A? If so, please use the search button to see if theyre already in our database.

description.text: If you cannot find their names, please fill in their name(s) in the form field.

name.text: Please upload an image - it can be a headshot, avatar, or an image that is representative of your work.

description.text: (JPEG or PNG only, 300X300 dpi). If no image is uploaded, we will use an IG Silhouette

name.text: Do we have your consent for your researcher profile to be shared on this public directory? (This excludes self-identification information provided above.)
IG Research Directory Submission Form Template

description.text: This template is designed for IG Research Directory Submission Form

post-action.success-message: Thank you for submitting your resource to the Task-based Language Teaching resource collection. We will review and add it to the resources collection .

pop-up.title: Confirm Submission
pop-up.body: Do you want to submit this resource to the resource collection? Once submitted, you cannot edit it.

post-action.success-message: Thank you for submitting to IG Research Directory. You can view your application and it's status by click on here.

pop-up.title: Confirmation
pop-up.body: Do you really want to submit this document?
pop-up.message: Once submitted, you cannot update the document.

pop-up.title: Confirmation
pop-up.body: Do you really want to delete this document?
pop-up.message: Once deleted, you cannot access this document.
